metadata.description:
In the heart of a sprawling industrial complex, three men find themselves captivated by an enigmatic anomaly. Within the depths of a massive factory or base, a peculiar object, resembling a ball, hovers mysteriously. Its surface pulsates with otherworldly energy, hinting at a profound secret waiting to be unraveled.

Engrossed in their discovery, two of the men stand in awe, their gazes fixed upon the mesmerizing sphere. They exchange whispers, speculating about its origin and purpose, their minds swirling with curiosity and intrigue. Meanwhile, the third man, aware of the significance of their find, urgently reaches for his communication device. He is in the midst of a call with their superior, endeavoring to convey the magnitude of the situation and seeking guidance.
metadata.name: Matter #1/10
